column3: but since I have mostly eaten Spanish food in Spain
column4: some of the food seemed Americanized
column5: and not necessarily worth the price.  The fried chicken with piri piri sauce tasted like boneless buffalo wings and the goat cheese with tomato sauce ended up seeming like a glorified French bread pizza in the end with garlic bread as the base.  But the octopus and patatas bravas and pinxtos tasted delicious.
